TopicTitle: Anyone have craft files for Laztek's SpaceX Launch Pack?

Articles.Content: Noob to KSP, And cant seem how to build the Falcon 9, so was wondering if anyone knows/has craft files for the falcon 9 with Dragon and Dragon V2 and the Falcon 9 with the farrings. Thanks!

Noob to KSP, And cant seem how to build the Falcon 9, so was wondering if anyone knows/has craft files for the falcon 9 with Dragon and Dragon V2 and the Falcon 9 with the farrings. Thanks!

There in the zip file you downloaded every pack has a ship folder in it just open the zip and copy them to KSP\ship\VAB folder in it's a career game KSP\saves\ name of your career here \Ships\ VAB

Hope it helps.
